Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The code used to prepare statements for update is repeated twice in this code with the same logic. This can be extracted into a separate method to avoid code duplication.

Improvements.Improvement: Use try-with-resources to ensure resources are properly closed
Improvements.Description: The code is currently not using try-with-resources, which can lead to resource leaks if exceptions occur. This can be improved by using try-with-resources, which automatically closes resources regardless of whether exceptions occur.

Improvements.Improvement: Use Optional to handle null values
Improvements.Description: The code is currently using null checks, which can be improved by using Optional. This can help avoid NullPointerExceptions and make the code cleaner and easier to read.
